name: Red Shift by Team Zombie Lizard
name_original: Red Shift by Team Zombie Lizard
description:
Shoot lizards and resurrect them as zombie meat shields!

A side-scrolling shmup made for a university course at Campus Gotland, Uppsala University.

Made by:

  • Simon Östman
  • Erik Högberg
  • Mateusz Romanowski
  • Kevin Anderson
  • Anton "Kim" Johnson
  • Mick Ronchen
  • Nike Törnros

Controls:

Uses keyboard and mouse.

WASD for movement.
Left click to shoot.
Middle click to fire all batteries (once available).
Space to make zombies from nearby corpses (once available).
F to switch between zombies walking forwards or staying close to you.
Hold right click to move all zombies.
